successes.title: iBox Nano - Worlds Smallest, Least Expensive 3D Printer
successes.description: Created with the home based user in mind, the iBox Nano is the worlds smallest, most affordable 3D Resin Printer.

Pledges.description: Thank You: Follow us though our success and get updates. Get added to the Supporters word cloud on our website.
Acrylic plaque with iBox Printers logo laser etched on it. We will do this in-house using our array of laser cutters. This will make a nice desk ornament to show your support.

Very Early Bird Supporter: This level is for those who are early supporters and thus will help us kick off the launch with a bang. Get the iBox Nano at the absolute lowest pledge in exchange for helping us get the word out. Comes with one 95ml container of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.

Early Bird Supporter: This level is for those who are early supporters and thus will help us kick off the launch with a bang. Get the iBox Nano at a limited special pledge and help us get the word out. Comes with one 95ml container of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.
Limited: Get the iBox Nano at a limited special pledge. Comes with one 95ml container of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.
Get the iBox Nano from the first full production run. Comes with one 95ml container of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.

Late Christmas Gift: Get one of the first iBox Nanos delivered as a gift. Since it will be after Christmas you will also get an Acrylic plaque with iBox Printers logo, an image of the Nano and a From: and To: names custom laser etched on it to wrap up under the tree for Christmas morning. Comes with two 95ml containers of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.

Early Beta Adopter: Get one the first iBox Nanos delivered and be part of the limited Beta team and have your feedback and feature requests considered for implementation. You can also select a custom color for the top of the Nano. Comes with two 95ml containers of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.
Get TWO iBox Nanos from the first full production run. Comes with TWO 95ml containers of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.

Super Early Beta Adopter: Get one of the first iBox Nanos delivered from the first production batch and be part of the limited Beta team and have your feedback and feature requests considered for implementation. You can also select a custom color for the top of the Nano. Comes with three 95ml containers of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.

Super Early Beta Adopter Box Set: Get one of the first iBox Nanos delivered from the first production batch in a custom fitted travel case and be part of the limited Beta team and have your feedback and feature requests considered for implementation. You can also select a custom color for the top of the Nano. Comes with three 95ml containers of Resin in red, green, blue, or yellow. Shipping not included.

First production units #3 - #10. These have been manufactured and are awaiting only test and Q&A. You can change the color of the top acrylic. You can also specify to have something personal laser etched in the unit, and of course it will ship in a custom fitted travel case. These units will ship in December, but maybe not by Christmas, we will try but can not guarantee it. Note: You will expect to have to update the software in January at the start of the production run.

Second iBox Nano off of the production line. Documented and laser etched in a matching travel case. Available in any color or color combination except for Pink. This is only suited for the second most eccentric among us. Note that this reward level, however stratospheric it may seem, is below the MSRP of some of our competitors.

Very first iBox Nano off of the production line. Documented and laser etched in a matching travel case. Available in any color or color combination except for Pink. This is only suited for the most eccentric among us. Note that this reward level, however stratospheric it may seem, is below the MSRP of some of our competitors. We received an email asking for this to be made available.
